metadata.title: CVE-2023-34256 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.3.There is an out-of-bounds read in crc16 in lib/crc16.c when called fromfs/ext4/super.c because ext4_group_desc_csum does not properly check anoffset. NOTE: this is disputed by third parties because the kernel is notintended to defend against attackers with the stated "When modifying theblock device while it is mounted by the filesystem" access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34256` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-6.3.0-7-generic-lpae - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic - 6.3.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-generic-64k - 6.3.0-7.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-aws - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-azure - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1005-gcp - 6.5.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency - 6.3.0-7.7.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.3.0-7-lowlatency-64k - 6.3.0-7.7.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi - 6.5.0-1001.1
linux-image-6.2.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 6.5.0-1001.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7').
linux-aws package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1004.4').
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.3').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1003.3').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.0-7.7.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1004.4').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1001.1').
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
